title: Identification Card
description: An identification card with a portrait and words. May be used to remind people to bring or show an id. May also be used in the context of a fake id.
apple_vendor_description: The identification card emoji on Apple devices appears as a modern, rectangular card with a subtle glossy finish and soft, rounded corners, reflecting Appleâ€™s commitment to clean and tactile design.  Its surface is clean, suggesting a space for a photo or important information, symbolizing identity, membership, or access.  This emoji is ideal for conveying concepts related to personal identification, security, or official documentation in a professional and stylized manner.
